EmailTemplate.name: 201908_IMU_Global_Not Contacted Leads_JRD.201908_IMU_Global_Email_Not Contacted
EmailTemplate.subject: Watch: Honeywell Inertial Navigation System Delivers Precision Accuracy to 3D Mapping
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TtD50Cd7ilY]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Recently, Honeywell surpassed a significant milestone of delivering more than 500,000 high performance inertial sensors and navigators to customers.
With decades of experience testing and learning from our customers’ applications, we’ve been able to reach incredible heights in navigation technology.
“We can recommend the Honeywell unit because we have used it for different projects in different countries, sometimes under difficult weather conditions and we have never had an issue with collecting or storing the data." - Aeroscout founder and general manager, Dr. Christoph Eck
You can read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/case-studies/2019/march/honeywell-navigator-delivers-precise-location-accuracy]]> about how Aeroscout is using our HGuide n580 to improve data fidelity on their industrial UAVs.
For a limited time, you can try a Honeywell IMU or navigator before you buy*. Contact us today to learn more.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/tbyb-program?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_imu_gh]]>
*Try before you buy program is subject to availability and execution of Honeywell’s bailment agreement. Limit one (1) product per customer. Customer must return unit in 30 days from the time the unit is received. Customers who do not return the unit within 30 days will be charged full MSRP at standard Honeywell terms and conditions.
